name: Grandmother's House RPG
description:
(Trailer reflects 1.0 release.)

This game is recommended as 10+ for fantasy violence, themes of death and light horror, and some mild cursing.

Welcome to Grandmother's House, a short RPG adventure game with light horror elements and a unique world to explore.

Step into the shoes of Yuto and Nuki, two siblings visiting their grandmother's house shortly after her death. What the two believe to be a quick visit to collect their things turns into one of horrors, however, as they're met with a darkness they've never come across before.

Explore your surroundings, progress through the story, and take on epic battles. Will you escape Grandmother's House?

[This game is fully voice acted by Multispace,  Tiffany Olszower, Notwhorosethinks, Charon, and David G!! VAs are paid a percentage of sales, so your support goes towards the entire team.]
